alert.note: Alert for Georgetown; Horry; Marion (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 07 at 3:46PM EDT until April 07 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Georgetown County in northeastern South Carolina... Horry County in northeastern South Carolina... South central Marion County in northeastern South Carolina... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 345 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Outland, or 16 miles southwest of Conway, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Myrtle Beach, Conway, North Myrtle Beach, Surfside Beach, Myrtle Beach Airport, Socastee, Red Hill, Springmaid Pier, Garden City, North Myrtle Beach Airport, Murrells Inlet, Horry, Loris, Hickory Grove, Homewood, Horry Georgetown Technical College Conway Campus, Adrian, Pee Dee Crossroads, Oatland and Nixonville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
